1] CONIUM MACULATUM-20-Parts-Poison hemlock-
 Conium is an excellent remedy, such as difficult gait, trembling, sudden loss of strength while waking, painful stiffness of legs, etc. It corresponds to the debility, hypochondriasis, urinary troubles, weakened memory , sexual debility found here. General feeling as if bruised by blows. Weakness of body and mind, trembling, and palpitation. Cancerous diathesis, arterio-sclerosis, caries of sternum, enlarged glands. Acts on glandular system, insomnia of multiple neuritis.

2] CHELIDONIUM MAJUS-20-Parts-Celandine-
 A prominent liver remedy, the jaundiced skin, and especially the constant pain under inferior angle of right scapula. Used for warts, liver diseases, many ailments of the digestive system, and for eye irritation, herpes, serous effusion, hydrocele. Bilious complication during gestation.

3] PODOPHYLUM PELTATUM-20-Parts-Mayapple-
 It is especially adapted to person of bilious temperament. It affects chiefly the duodenum, small intestine, liver, and rectum. The podophyllum disease is a gastro-enteritis with colicky pain and bilious vomiting. Stool is watery with jelly like mucus, painless profuse. Many troubles during pregnancy, prolapsus uteri, painless cholera morbus. Torpidity of liver, portal engorgement with a tendency to hemorrhoids, hypogastric pains. It is also used topically for treating precancerous white patches on the tongue and mouth.

4] RHUS TOXICODENDRON-20-Parts-Poison ivy-
 The effect on the skin, rheumatic pains, mucus membrane affections, and a typhoid type of fever, make this remedy frequently indicated. Rheu’s affects fibrous tissue markedly-joints, tendons, sheaths, aponeurosis, etc., producing pains and stiffness. Tearing asunder pains. Septic conditions, cellulitis and infections, carbuncle in early stages, septicemia, rheumatism in cold season. Inflammation of GIT.

5] PIMPENELLA SAXIFRAGA-10-Parts-
 Used for upper respiratory tract infections, urinary tract infections, diuretic, kidney and bladder stone, calms nervous excitation, to helps digestion.

6] VINCETOXICUM OFFICINALIS-10-Parts-Sage-
 Antioxidant, antibacterial, anti-inflammatory, diuretic, expectorant, promotes menstruation, acts on skin, induce vomiting, purgative, antitumor, snake bite etc.

7] CARDUS BENEDICTUS-10-Parts-Blessed Thistle-
 To treat digestive problems, loss of appetite, indigestion, diarrhea. For cold, cough, fever, bacterial infection, and it is also used as a diuretic, stimulate lactation.
